name: Sprint2 (tg276)
description: This is a simple game, which has features to pain by using 3D Primitives. Users can choose 3D primitive shapes: sphere, capsule, or cube. In addition to that, users  are able to mix color palette by switching sliders, users can change opacity, size of primitives.  On the right side user can see a clock which shows the current time. A toggle allows users to stop destroying all the objects. Also, users can destroy everything at once by pressing "Destroy All" button.
